attributes.action: To include NHS workers in the £900,000 public sector pay rise
attributes.additional_details: The NHS workers have worked very hard during the pandemic to save lives, whilst putting their own lives in danger. Nurses and junior doctors have been the backbone of this pandemic during covid-19 and now workers feel they are yet again forgotten. This is unacceptable.
attributes.background: Include all NHS workers in the public sector pay rise and scrap the agenda for change and give workers what they deserve. They work 12 hour shifts, day shifts, night shifts, leave their own families at christmas to work, we need to appreciate our nhs workers
